short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a random Quran ayah in a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Orginal arabic, english translations and Audio Player.

Update: 1.9:
- Fix missing Videos.

Update: 1.8:
- Added more Background Videos.

Update: 1.7:
- Bugfix: Fix Background image issue.
- Added Videos backgrounds.

Update: 1.6:
- Bugfix: Fix play pause state.

Update 1.5:
- Added menu buttons to play, pause and stop Quran player.

Update 1.4:
- Optimizations and styling fixes.
- Added Surah info tooltip on hover of the Surah name.

Update 1.3:
- Add Surah and Ayah dropdowns to be able to select a specific one.
- Styling fixes

Update 1.2:
- Add audio player.
- Add next and prev buttons to navigate ayahs.

Update 1.1:
- Reduce animation time for Background images.
- Increase font size for Surah-name.
- Change Quran english translation to yusufali.
